relays.title: Relays
relays.description: The names of the relays on your controllers that should be includes in HomeKit

controllers.title: Zencontrol Controllers
controllers.description: The Zencontrol controllers on your local network that have a TPI license.

id.title: ID
id.description: The ID of the controller. Use the same ID as in the cloud interface.

address.title: Address
address.description: The IP address of the controller on your local network.

port.title: Port
port.description: The port number the controller listens on. Leave blank to use the default port.

macAddress.title: MAC Address
macAddress.description: The MAC address of the controller, e.g. FFFFFFFFFFFF or FF:FF:FF:FF:FF:FF
